pros: With working for this ministry, you know that you are making a real impact with gospel-saturated schools. It is really special to be a part of what God is doing around the world through GEM. The staff here really care about one another.
cons: Ministry life is never easy no matter what you do. You have the opportunity to pour out your life to make Jesus known! It is always worth it!

pros: saving time and from teaching at home.
cons: nothing to do more till i experience it.

pros: you feel like you are doing something important
cons: it takes a lot of energy

review_title: work and life balance is great but still pay is so little
pros: Stable job, getting bonus during holiday or by the end of the year
cons: But still, pay is so little. Got to treat better for Elementary school teacher (South Korea)
